attributes.description:
SPECS 
MAZDA 3
1.5L Dynamic Automatic

CONNECTIVITY

MZD Connect System 8.8-inch display screen
Commander Dial
Apple Carplay® & Android Auto®
USB connectivity ports - 2 Ports
Bluetooth® hands free system
8 Speaker sound system

SAFETY

Airbags SRS: Driver, Passenger, Knee, Side &
Curtain
Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
Child restraint anchor points (ISOFIX)
Dynamic Stability Control (DSC)
Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD)
Emergency Brake Assist (EBA)
Hill Launch Assist (HLA)
Seat-belt warning - Driver & Passenger -
Pretensioners, load-limiters & height adjustable
shoulder anchorages
Auto door lock
Super Lock System
Burglar alarm system
Engine immobiliser
High mount brake lamp
Parking sensors - Rear

EXTERIOR

Headlamps - Auto on/off
LED Headlamps
Headlamp Levelling
Power fold mirrors
Front rain-sensing wipers
Rear wiper with intermittent function
16-inch Alloy Wheels

ENGINE
Max Power (kW): 88
Max Torque (nM):153
i-stop
FWD

INTERIOR

Head-Up Display (HUD)
Electronic Parking Brake (EPB)
Auto Hold
Auto dimming rear-view mirror
Air-conditioning (Manual)
Cruise control
Trip Computer
Leather-wrapped steering wheel
Leather-wrapped: gear shift knob
Multi-function steering wheel with controls
Tilt & telescopic adjustable steering wheel
Overhead sunglass storage box
Height adjustable seat - Driver
Seat trim - Black Cloth
Rear centre seat armrest with cupholders
Seat - Rear fold down (60:40 Split fold)
Smart_keyless push-button engine start
Power windows (One Touch) - Driver &
Passengers


PERFORMANCE 
Engine in-line 4 cylinder 16 valve DOHC S-VT Petrol
(SKYACTIV-G) with i-stop
Drive Train FWD
Engine Capacity 1.5L
Maximum Power 88kW
Maximum Torque 153Nm
Transmission Description 6-Speed Automatic
New

T&C APPLY
Deal Subject to successful in-house finance approval at Dealership
Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees

Trade-ins accepted

attributes.description:
Balance of factory warranty 3Yrs 100 000Km whichever comes first expires 06 November 2023 & balance of service plan 3Yrs/30 000km whichever comes first expires 06 November 2023, Etios Sport include a two-tone paint job, rear spoiler, special 15-inch alloy wheels and a digital rev-counter. Not to mention the new Sport badge plonked on the rear. The two-tone aspect of the colours involves a black roof accompanying the red. Features include: Remote central locking, electric windows, aircon, radio and cd player, usb and aux input, Bluetooth, airbags, power steering. Trade ins appreciated, finance facilities available and deliveries arranged nationwide
